title: Social Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and fundamental smartphone usage skills
context.additional_context: Cultivates foundational social studies competencies through mobile learning in BYOD environments, with project-based assessments measuring learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can independently study social studies content (5-minute segments) at least three times per week using a mobile microlearning platform
Learners can conduct field research and data collection using mobile learning tools and write analytical reports on social issues based on the findings
Learners can improve project deliverables by exchanging real-time feedback with peers at least twice using mobile collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
